abstract: A possible merger of XM Satellite Radio Holdings and its rival, Sirius Satellite Radio, snagged another believer Wednesday when a Citigroup analyst raised her price target on XM. Shares of the company made a double-digit leap Wednesday after the analyst, Eileen Furukawa, lifted her 12-month price target on the company to $21 from $16 a share, telling clients that she believed a merger between the two companies could happen before the fall.
lead_paragraph: A possible merger of XM Satellite Radio Holdings and its rival, Sirius Satellite Radio, snagged another believer Wednesday when a Citigroup analyst raised her price target on XM. Shares of the company made a double-digit leap Wednesday after the analyst, Eileen Furukawa, lifted her 12-month price target on the company to $21 from $16 a share, telling clients that she believed a merger between the two companies could happen before the fall.

headline.main: Satellite Radio Merger Talk Gets a Lift from Citigroup
